name: scrapple
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a dish consisting of small pieces of pork (= meat from a pig) and cornmeal (= rough flour made from the yellow seeds of a tall plant) fried together in a pan: I like scrapple to be really crispy. We kept the leftover bits of meat and used them to make scrapple.
More examplesFewer examplesScrapple is a regional favorite in Pennsylvania and the surrounding states.My grandparents lived near Pittsburgh and always had scrapple for breakfast.I still have the huge cast-iron pot that my grandmother used to cook scrapple in.
